example.ex: In a desperate attempt to stave off defeat, he reluctantly promised wholesale reform of the constitution...
example.tran: 为了竭力避免败局，他勉强答应要对宪法进行大规模修改。

example.ex: But the reality of discovery was a different matter, and he did all he could to stave it off.
example.tran: 但所发现的实际情况完全是另一回事，所以他只好尽自己所能暂缓其发生。

value.def: If you stave off something bad, or if you stave it off, you succeed in stopping it happening for a while.
